text: @ImranKhanPTI At least learn to speak the truth from your aviation minister. He admitted that PIA airlines are run by bus drivers. And you are making the whole nation fool with your tweets. Ask any ambulance driver of edihi foundation and he will tell the truth about covid19 situation in pak
